UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Synthetic analogs of anoplin show improved antimicrobial activities.
Literature.Author: Munk JK, Uggerhøj LE, Poulsen TJ, Frimodt-Møller N, Wimmer R, Nyberg NT, Hansen PR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=5.3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=15.8µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=3.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=15.8µM),Candida albicans ATCC 200955(MIC=9.5µM)
